mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_identification_tab (userId, userAccount, userName, userPhone, userCertType, userCertNo, identificationStatus, remark, identiTime, addTime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userCertType}, #{userCertNo}, #{identificationStatus}, #{remark}, #{identiTime}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, userId, userAccount, userName, userPhone, userCertType, userCertNo, identificationStatus, remark, identiTime, addTime FROM user_identification_tab WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM user_identification_tab WHERE (identificationStatus = 1 OR identificationStatus = 2) AND userCertNo = #{userCertNo}

SELECT id, userId, userAccount, userName, userPhone, userCertType, userCertNo, identificationStatus, remark, identiTime, addTime FROM user_identification_tab WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY addTime DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT id, userId, userAccount, userName, userPhone, userCertType, userCertNo, identificationStatus, remark, identiTime, addTime FROM user_identification_tab WHERE userAccount = #{userAccount} ORDER BY addTime DESC LIMIT 0,1
